title: Saudi Arabia Sells $11.5 Billion Through Dollar Bond Sale
description: Saudi Arabia raised $11.5 billion through a dollar bond sale as it taps global markets to help fund huge projects aimed at reducing its economic dependence on oil.
content: Saudi Arabia raised $11.5 billion through a dollar bond sale as it taps global markets to help fund huge projects aimed at reducing its economic dependence on oil.
